text: Maiboza, also called Iulia or Julia, was a town of ancient Lydia. The name Maiboza does not occur among ancient authors, but is inferred from epigraphic and other evidence. Its site is located near Gölmarmara in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Manisa Province
title: Maiboza
